welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hovelhof, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of this quaint town known for its picturesque countryside and rich history. We invite you to explore and make the most of your time here. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
